caption.title: Target speciesâ€™ records and mean probability of occurrence under current and future (2080) climate scenarios.
caption.p: Means are calculated across five Regional Climate models. Mean probability of occurrence is based on ensemble models for upland species Acaena antarctica, Azorella selago, Nassauvia falklandica, western species Azorella monantha, Blechnum cordatum, Sticherus cryptocarpa and southwestern species Nastanthus falklandicus, Plantago moorei.
